lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But if the Reagan administration did announce measures, they could be a part of an internationally-coordinated effort to end the instability in financial markets with genuine action to reduce massive economic imbalances, monetary analysts believe.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It could coincide with the June Venice summit of leaders of the seven major industrial democracies -- the United States, Japan, West Germany, Britain, France, Italy and Canada.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The prospect of renewed assaults on the dollar might force the United States eventually to unveil distasteful measures to bolster support for its currency, monetary analysts and economists said.

lst.name: sentence
